text: @wortelsoup @non_philosophy For original texts, I really like Wiener's "Human Use of Human Beings" & Bateson's "Steps to an Ecology of Mind". I learned a lot from "Dynamics in Action" by Juarrero as a primer on general systems theory. As a basic intro, "Collapse of Chaos" by Cohen & Stewart is superb.
